description:
This course provides students with keys to understanding their true divine nature and the conscious and unconscious beliefs, attitudes, behaviors that maybe holding them back from living a fulfilling life and provides spiritual tools and techniques to uncover the problems and remedy them over time. The student examines the different circumstances and events of their life and their choices and rationals through these exercises that have shaped their lives(fate). Many of these choices are conscious or unconscious(karma) choices that must be owned as the active or passive participation with a reality that may not provide them with a fulfilling life or harms another.

By taking ownership of our choices and identifying with our divine nature the student can begin to transform themselves become a conscious creator of their life and reach for their destiny.
title: Mastering Your Fate, Karma & Destiny
